entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tar: Detect magic numbers in archives compressed with popular algorithms #89056
    Future
  • Connect_DatagramSockets_DontThrowConnectedException_OnSecondAttempt fails on iOS #89055
    8.0.0
  • [osx][x64] LibraryImportGenerator unit test segfault illegal memory access #89054
  • Native AOT application linking with external static library or object files #89044
  • When binding to interface collections, config generator shouldn't generate logic for both interface & mapping collection type. #89043
    8.0.0
  • PublishAot with a specific Runtime version is broken #89040
  • System.Native: eng/native/tryrun.cmake host/target confusion #89039
    8.0.0
  • Add tar test with custom stream that simulates reading/writing >8GB file entry #89037
    Future
  • EventSource_ParallelRequests_LogsNewConnectionIdForEachRequest timeout on OSX #89035
    8.0.0
  • Simplify aka.ms/dotnet links used in runtime/host #89034
  • Marshalling source generation code could pass TypePositionInfo and StubCodeContext only to constructors and have parameterless generation methods #89033
  • [HttpClientFactory] ILoggerFactory dependency issue #89032
  • Follow up on UseSocketsHttpHandler API #89023
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding source generator fails to compile with CS8600 when using nullable reference types #89019
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding source generator throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException on macOS and Linux #89014
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding source generator fails with CS8598 error #89010
    8.0.0
  • ECDiffieHellmanOpenSsl throws PlatformNotSupported on macOS #89006
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue>.GetOrAdd #89002
  • Multiple IL2049 warnings when publishing with NativeAOT and _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88994
  • [mono] Access Violation when running certain outerloop tests on Windows x86 #88992
    Future
  • Tier0 allocates on a simple cast (boxing) #88987
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failing `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector128Tests.*` due to Specified type is not supported #88983
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Tests failing due to TypeInfoResolver not providing JsonTypeInfo metadata for a type #88982
    8.0.0
  • Https_MultipleRequests_TlsResumed test is unreliable #88979
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #88977
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.Kill_EntireProcessTree_True_CalledByNonLocalProcess_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #88976
  • GetActiveTcpConnections throw PlatformNotSupportedException on linux if IPV6 not enabled #88975

Closed

  • Can't go from build to wasm testing in one go on a M1 Mac #72722
    8.0.0
  • Some culture tests failing on latest Windows 11 builds #79867
    8.0.0
  • Debugging execution code in vs is slow, but the program is compiled and runs fine #78940
    8.0.0
  • TarReader throws on various archives that other tools accept #74316
    Future
  • The given key 'size' was not present in the dictionary in coreclr libraries outerloop tests #87359
    8.0.0
  • Timeout on System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize #88271
    8.0.0
  • ConcurrentDictionary.FirstOrDefault performance issue #88953
  • [7.0] [Android] Test failure in X509Certificates.Tests.PfxTests - Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform #88747
    7.0.x
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails to find the new version of the LDAP library on Ubuntu 22.04 #69456
    8.0.0
  • timeout in FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #88921
  • [API Proposal]: BCL additions to support C# 12's "Collection Literals" feature. #87569
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Span based constructors for BitArray #89038
  • Self contained WPF app's cold start can be 2-3 seconds #78379
  • JIT struct work planned for .NET 8 #76931
    8.0.0
  • JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute should provide an option for enabling string enum serialization globally #87195
    8.0.0
  • Weird behavior serializing byte array to JSON #89024
  • missing runtime link using old RIDs #88223
    8.0.0
  • Default Blazor WebAssembly publish now outputs dotnet.native.wasm in wrong place #89031
    8.0.0
  • UDP socket cannot be disconnected with Connect(IPAddress.Any, 0) #77962
    8.0.0
  • CoreBindingHelper for configuration binding source generator should be marked as [GeneratedCode] #89007
    8.0.0
  • ExtendedProtectionPolicy constructor throws unnecessarily on WASM #77405
    8.0.0
  • Conflict in Property Serialization with System.Text.Json When Hiding Base Interface Properties in Child Interface #88774
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Ascii #88670
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.ProduceDiagnosticFromOtherAssemblyTest #88579
    8.0.0
  • CI: `runtime-ioslike-coreclr`, and `runtime-ioslike-mono` running on unrelated PRs #88995
    8.0.0
  • CI: `runtime-ioslike-mono`, and `runtime-ioslike-coreclr` pipelines are broken due to setup issues #88996
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add transport error code to QuicException #87262
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: BrowserDebugHost.dll running from DevServer is missing roll-forward runtime policy #88391
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Configure SocketsHttpHandler for HttpClientFactory with IConfiguration #84075
    8.0.0
  • Building iOS in release mode still attaches `--debug` flag to Mono AOT compiler #88940
  • [API Proposal]: Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #67868
    Future
  • [mono][ios] EventPipe processinfo3 test is failing on iOS-like platforms #88186
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Feedback on regex parser PR #89060
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2223937 #89058
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update script to replace the BDN version being used in the PerfBDN app #89057
    area-Infrastructure
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [7.0 port] #89053
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Improve GC pause counter naming #89052
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocations in Get/SetMsQuicParameter #89050
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Dedup OnWriteResume between {ReadOnly}Memory converters #89049
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Just testing that Windows Threadpool tests are part of runtime pipeline #89048
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #89047
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve text for OpenSsl primitives when OpenSSL is not available #89046
    area-System.Security
  • Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89045
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove `#if NETCOREAPP` from test #89041
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [aot] Build cross compilers targeting x64/x86 hosted on osx-arm64 #89027
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Avoid extra console write for clearing on Unix #89026
    area-System.Console
  • Add NativeAOT runtime pack builds for osx x64/arm64 #89018
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #89015
    area-Build-mono
  • Clean up debugger attributes tests. #89011
    area-Debugger-mono, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Build the shim assemblies as part of libs.sfx #89005
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx": 2 for BrowserDebugHost #89004
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx": 2 for BrowserDebugHost #89003
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] Wasm SDK in-tree #89001
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Enable self init of nollvm methods #88998
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update targetingpacks.targets #88991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fold BOX+ISINST to null if possible #88989
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add IO.Packaging test to check non-unicode value in ZipArchiveEntry general purpose bit flag #88978
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Implement HttpRequestError #88974
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable Nullable compilation on the Options source gen #88973
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix Globalization Tests #88969
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Fix PAX regression when handling the size of really long unseekable data streams #88280
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • wrap exceptions from callbacks in QuicError.CallbackError #88614
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Register a callback that tries to load other versions Open LDAP library if the default is failed #88851
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Enable CA1863 (Use 'CompositeFormat') as suggestion #89029
    area-Meta
  • Use a HashSet instead of Dictionary in XNodeValidator #89030
    area-System.Xml
  • Prevent Arm64 CrossDac builds running on Arm64. #88467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add collection literal support for immutable collections #88470
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Check client version to send debugger message #89025
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Relaxing IsConnected Check for Datagram Sockets #87916
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0-staging] Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #89020
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • Delete `VerifyExpectModifiedAttributesWork`. #89017
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Delete com removal tests #89012
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove the ignore from `CustomStepCanResolveTypesAfterSweep` #89016
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add JsonSourceGenerationOptions.UseStringEnumConverter #88984
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add coreclr_shutdown to mono #88594
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Update missing runtime/framework install URL to use host RID #88359
    area-Host
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added QuicException.TransportErrorCode #88550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Standardize `AddBodySubstituterStep` #89013
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable ExtendedProtectionPolicy in generic System.Net.Security build #88871
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add SocketsHttpHandler requests-queue-duration metrics #88981
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex" #89022
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Configure SocketsHttpHandler for HttpClientFactory with IConfiguration #88864
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Relax property naming conflict resolution for interface hierarchies. #88916
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • remove redundant OR #88993
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #88854
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • Simplify KeyAnalyzer #88709
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove runtime-ioslike-mono and runtime-ioslike-coreclr pipelines #88999
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Remove extra checks for known types in log formatter #89000
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix HTTP/1.1 concurrent request content read race condition #86715
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Add support for tvOS in processinfo tests #88988
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-tvos, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Using "rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx": 2 for BrowserDebugHost #88919
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Move code around in WBT in preparation for fixes, and cleanups #88980
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Don't crash the trim analyzer if it finds unrecognized nodes in the input #88836
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Add support for mobile devices in processinfo3 test #88655
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Run NativeAOT tests when ILLink changes #88934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix GCDesc computation #88927
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Some UnsafeAccessorAttribute support for methods and constructors #88925
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix memory leaks for interpreted dynamic methods. #88892
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for default implementation of static virtuals with method constraints #89061
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Extend SocketsHttpHandler Connection and Request telemetry #88853
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • unroll byref struct copies #86820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • For the dprintf output of the median overhead figure, the type of the… #86886
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on store if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter or struct field #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] macOS/iOS: Emit simple compact unwinding information #88724
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Get DataContractSerializer to behave nicely with unloadable AssemblyLoadContext #88791
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JSON: Add support for Int128, UInt128 and Half… #88962
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix pooled array leak #88810
    area-System.IO
  • [WASM][WIP] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #88884
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Poc: add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • add test for SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ShallowClone #88557
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [libs][iOS] Unify `System.Linq.Expression.dll` build for all platforms #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add package readme for System.Net.Http #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [Android] Use NDK toolchain instead of CMake for library mode #88886
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #88559
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve byte array allocations with ArrayPool #88551
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Drop marshal-ilgen from iOS builds if it is not needed #88903
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Enter GC Unsafe mode in handle_signal_exception #88436
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Expose the left-handed matrix creation APIs #88930
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added ArrayBufferWriter<T>.ResetWrittenCount() #88009
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action

  • OpenSSL ENGINE support #88656
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717

  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910

  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add a portable implementation of RhGetCodeTarget #2333
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
    area-ManagedZLib
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix array allocators #2342
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Value of DOTNET_WATCH inconsistent at build time #34055
  • Consider adding `.idea` to gitignore #34050
  • There is no warning / error when PublishAot is true, but compiler is not restored #34049

Closed

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #34051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.1 in /eng/dependabot #34047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.1 in /eng/dependabot #34046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2223222 #34037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Override versions of previous runtime packs #32882
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34034
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Keep TrimMode=partial for projects targeting .NET 7 or below #34030
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Containers: improved `DockerRegistryManager` for tests reliability #33955
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .idea to .gitignore #34044
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132
    Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794

PullRequests

Merged

  • fix docs build warnings #7348

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LSIF generator tool should have some build time performance and reliability quality gate #69068
  • Adding missing params helper does not obey line feed configuration #69067
  • VSCode and VS 17.7.0 Preview 3.0 reports CA1822 when using Primary Constructor on non-record types #69061

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33917.221 #69073
  • Program crashes on second hot reload with stackalloc on method body #69027
    17.8
  • Expose internal API CodeAction.CodeActionPriority #42431
    Backlog
  • Issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68484
  • Two file-scoped extension methods with the same name cause NullReferenceException in GetSymbolInfo #69063
  • `ref` parameters on Primary constructors #69055

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 'initialize member from parameter' to work with primary constructors. #69072
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce TypeWithAnnotations array allocations for code path that don't use them #69071
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce `HashSet<TypeWithAnnotations>` allocations in MethodTypeInferrer.Fix #69070
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce bool array allocations in MethodTypeInferrer.FixParameters #69069
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Localize C# Interactive window title #69066
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
  • Warn that a user-defined API on an inline array type won’t be used by the language for an element access expression #69064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • Remove unused `DiagnosticBag` local in `BuildArgumentsForErrorRecovery` #69047
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Detect rude edits in trivia-only changes #69059
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not consider DOTNET_ROOT when finding dotnet #69010
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update roslyn-analyzers to 8.0.0-preview.23364.2 #69043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix NRE in TypedConstantComparer #69062
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Move CollectionLiteralTests.cs to Emit2 #69058
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make the new `RefKind.RefReadonlyParameter` sequential #69033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Updated

  • Move several value types over to being records #68956
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes documentation (VS2015 - VS2019) #69031
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Allow default values for `ref readonly` parameters #69032
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Simplify core lexing switch #69005
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Widen `RefKindVector` to hold `RefReadonlyParameter` #69034
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Pc active statements #69028
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor EventCallback not being considered immutable thus making child components to be rendered again #49476
  • Perf regression: mvc #49473
  • Move aspnetcore to leverage JsonWebToken and JsonWebTokenHandler #49469
  • [Blazor] Configure detailed errors for Razor component endpoints #49468
    8.0-rc1
  • RequestSizeLimit throws an error #49461
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49459
  • Allow overriding SignalR's Redis backplane channel's prefix instead of relying on hub class' name #49457
  • HttpNavigationManager already initialized on Blazor SSR. #49456
    8.0-rc1
  • IDX10720: Unable to create KeyedHashAlgorithm for algorithm 'HS512', the key size must be greater than: '512' bits, key has '256' bits. Arg_ParamName_Name #49455
  • Updating HttpContext.Request.Path inside middleware has no effect in selecting the endpoint for the request #49454
  • SignalR working even with API down WFT????? #49453

Closed

  • [Blazor] Form events follow ups #47804
    8.0-preview7
  • CascadingModelBinder: remove the IsFixed parameter #47902
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor SSR traditional form post handling #48760
    8.0-preview7
  • "There is no event handler associated with this event" error when submitting a Blazor form #49145
    8.0-preview7
  • NavigationException when attempting to navigate after submitting a form #49143
    8.0-preview7
  • RDG does not support private parameter and return types #47339
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile code with CS0246 error for endpoint with generic type parameter #49384
  • [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:2112, condition `<disabled>' not met #49302
  • Blazor SSR form post handling: integrate errors with ErrorBoundary #47903
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: single_query #49444
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #49458
  • When form is submitted with no handler, or the handler can't be found, change status to 400/404 #49359
    8.0-rc2
  • Don't reject ambiguous forms until we try to dispatch the submit event #49362
    8.0-preview7
  • Design proposal for a new QuickGridC component #49426
  • Blazor Web App dotnet 8 preview 6 request hangs on large page #49466
  • Detect invalid route such as `@page "/fhir{system}" in Blazor component #49445
  • Can built-in Ratelimit middleware work in Blazor Server App #49460
  • Blazor 8: Blazor Web App router does not seem to see pages in an RCL #49432
  • run programs #49462
  • Post docker compose and starting the microservice , service url comes back ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE #49182
  • Json Converter option ignored while binding enum from query #49398
  • Perf regression: json #49451

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix branch Wilson7 tests #49474
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Identity.Web to latest 2.13 which has defense in dep… #49467
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Emit diagnostics for unsupported RDG scenarios #49417
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview7
  • Forms PRG and error handling fixes #49472
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Forms behavior clarifications #49340
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `be03d00` to `cc36671` #49408
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • update version of identity model libraries #49349
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, community-contribution
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    Perf, area-networking, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • API template updates #49394
    area-mvc
  • Add support for explicit IParsable<T>.TryParse in RDF. #49317
    area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9a77922` to `b644ea1` #49407
    area-infrastructure
  • Option to use JsonWebTokenHandler in oidc handler #49333
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr
  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code Analysis should also check for EF client side evaluation #31288
  • Add a way to configure the concrete type for a primitive collection. #31287
  • How to populate collection of a many to many relation without needed to use Include()? #31283
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory.ExtendedSocketException: 'A non-blocking socket operation could not be completed immediately #31280
  • GroupBy().Select().Where() works for simple POCOs but not when using a class or record with a constructor for initialization #31279

Closed

  • Mapping inconsistency on boolean properties in JSON objects #31256

PullRequests

Created

  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289
  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.1.1 #31286
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • Added using existing collection for primitive collections not inside a JSON doc #31285
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #31284
    area-infrastructure
  • Uses existing JSON primitive collection instead of creating a new one #31282

Merged

  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #31274

Updated

  • Target .NET 8 #31270
    auto-merge
  • Support querying over non-primitive JSON collections #31095
  • Fixes and cleanup around JSON collection SQL value conversions #31261
  • Add `migrations has-pending-model-changes` Command #31164
    community-contribution
  • Part of JSON primitive collection serialization #31272
